rulesStrings.li:
questDescription->Word has reached you that Ghal Maraz has been returned to the world, and has been found. Unforunately, that word has reached others as well.

The warhammer is inside a temple of Sigmar that is not too far away.

Many beastmen have flocked to the location, in order to capture and destroy this most valuable of weapons. They've set up an encampment surrounding the temple, and intend to smash everything at the location to bits. They're working on defeating the magic of the warhammer so that they may breach the temple, and acquire the precious artifact.

There are many of them! Arm yourselves well, and seek the warhammer. Reclaim it for the glory of Sigmar.

Ghal Maraz is sacred. Don't lose it, for it will be needed to accomplish the end game goal of the Empire. This quest can be attempted multiple times without it going away should you fail. However once the warhammer is gained, you're entrusted with its safety.

With this warhammer a person may stand before an Effigy of Sigmar, and release it's power. This power will destroy all foes in a large radius of the planet. Each Empire settlement must do their part, and unleash this power to save the world from the End Times. Do your part for the glory of the Empire, and the future of mankind!

WorldObjectDef.label: Ghal Maraz Location
WorldObjectDef.description: The location of Sigmar's legendary warhammer Ghal Maraz. The place is lousy with beastmen trying to get the warhammer. They're currently working on dampening the warhammer's magic enough to take it.
